title: Biden Has Interviewed Three Candidates for Supreme Court
sub_head: The president is expected to announce his pick to replace retiring Justice Breyer by month’s end
body:
WASHINGTON—President Biden has conducted interviews with three potential picks for the Supreme Court as he nears a final decision on his promise to nominate a Black woman to the nation’s high court for the first time.
Mr. Biden in recent days has interviewed Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson, Judge Julianna Michelle Childs and Justice Leondra Reid Kruger, according to people familiar with the process.
